sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';
import './LoginBox.css';
import $ from 'jquery';


$(".email-signup").hide();
$("#signup-box-link").click(function () {
  $(".email-login").fadeOut(100);
  $(".email-signup").delay(100).fadeIn(100);
  $("#login-box-link").removeClass("active");
  $("#signup-box-link").addClass("active");
});
$("#login-box-link").click(function () {
  $(".email-login").delay(100).fadeIn(100);;
  $(".email-signup").fadeOut(100);
  $("#login-box-link").addClass("active");
  $("#signup-box-link").removeClass("active");
});

export default LoginBox =>
  <
  div class = "login-box" >
  <
  div class = "lb-header" >
  <
  a onclick = {
    LoginBox.loginOnClick
  }
class = "active"
id = "login-box-link" > Login < /a> <
  a onclick = {
    LoginBox.signUpOnClick
  }
id = "signup-box-link" > Sign Up < /a> <
  /div> <
  div class = "social-login" >
  <
  a onclick = {
    LoginBox.facebookOnClick
  } >
  <
  i class = "fa fa-facebook fa-lg" > < /i>
Login com Facebook
  <
  /a> <
  a onclick = {
    LoginBox.googleOnClick
  } >
  <
  i class = "fa fa-google-plus fa-lg" > < /i>
Login com o Google
  <
  /a> <
  /div> <
  form class = "email-login" >
  <
  div class = "u-form-group" >
  <
  input type = "email"
placeholder = "Email" / >
  <
  /div> <
  div class = "u-form-group" >
  <
  input type = "password"
placeholder = "Password" / >
  <
  /div> <
  div class = "u-form-group" >
  <
  button > Log in < /button> <
  /div> <
  div class = "u-form-group" >
  <
  a onclick = {
    LoginBox.forgotPasswordOnCLick
  }
class = "forgot-password" > Esquece a senha ? < /a> <
  /div> <
  /form> <
  form class = "email-signup" >
  <
  div class = "u-form-group" >
  <
  input type = "email"
placeholder = "Email" / >
  <
  /div> <
  div class = "u-form-group" >
  <
  input type = "password"
placeholder = "Password" / >
  <
  /div> <
  div class = "u-form-group" >
  <
  input type = "password"
placeholder = "Confirm Password" / >
  <
  /div> <
  div class = "u-form-group" >
  <
  button > Cadastrar < /button> <
  /div> <
  /form> <
  /div>
